message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor.  Take it before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, my turn to be realistic.  I'll take the same split you offered, but in my favor.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm meeting you closer to the middle, but time is running out.  52.5/47.5, take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise, but the split needs to be closer to even.  This is a fair offer considering the time pressure.
